@@ -823,6 +823,69 @@ def test_shape(sparse_dims, nnz, with_size):
         test_shape(4, 10, [100, 100, 100, 5, 5, 5, 0])
         test_shape(4, 0, [0, 0, 100, 5, 5, 5, 0])
 
+    @skipIfRocm
+    def test_sparse_sum(self):
+        nnz = 10
+        sparse_dims = 2
+        with_size = [5, 5, 3, 4]
+        S, _, _ = self._gen_sparse(sparse_dims, nnz, with_size)
+        S = S.coalesce()
+        D = S.to_dense()
+
+        self.assertEqual(torch.sparse.sum(S), D.sum())
+
+        # raise at SparseTensor.sum()
+        self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: S.sum())
+
+        test_dims = []
+        for i in range(1, 5):
+            test_dims += itertools.combinations(range(len(with_size)), i)
+
+        keepdim = [False, True]
+
+        for td in test_dims:
+            for k in keepdim:
+                S_copy = S.clone()
+                S_sum = torch.sparse.sum(S, td, k)
+                D_sum = D.sum(td, k)
+                self.assertEqual(S_sum.to_dense() if S_sum.is_sparse else S_sum, D_sum)
+                self.assertEqual(S_copy.to_dense(), S.to_dense())  # ensure S is not changed
+
+        # raise at dims out of range
+        self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: torch.sparse.sum(S, 5))
+
+        # test backward
